name: Gery Jonathan
title: Fresh IT Graduate
about: Passionate about Data Science, Cybersecurity, Backend Development, and Machine Learning. Experienced in predictive modeling, NLP, mobile apps, and UI/UX design.

projects.title: Banking Transaction ETL Automation
projects.description: Automated ~9.5M transactions by building an ETL pipeline that converts raw Excel to CSV and loads into MySQL, reducing manual effort by 80%.

projects.title: Thesis: Deepfake Video Detection
projects.description: Developed an efficient deepfake detection system that balances accuracy and computational performance.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Built an interactive analytics dashboard for data insights and reporting.

projects.title: Lit Finder (Bangkit Capstone)
projects.description: Personalized book recommendation app using content-based and collaborative filtering with fine-tuned embeddings.

projects.title: Pokedex (Mobile App)
projects.description: Pokédex mobile app that identifies Pokémon using a MobileNetV2 model with ~93% accuracy.

projects.title: Beijing Air Quality Dashboard
projects.description: Analyzed Beijing air quality data and built a Streamlit dashboard for visualization and insights.

projects.title: Cardiovascular Disease Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed 70,000 patient records to understand key health factors influencing cardiovascular disease.

projects.title: Boston Housing Price Prediction
projects.description: Built and fine-tuned ML models for predicting housing prices with a low RMSE of 3.278.

projects.title: Rujak (Web Development)
projects.description: Developed backend features for a tax payment app, including CRUD, quiz, and comment system.

projects.title: InFinIt (UI/UX Design)
projects.description: Mobile app prototype aligned with UN SDGs, designed for Gemastik 2023 competition.

projects.title: Ekonomi Plus (UI/UX Design)
projects.description: Prototype app for economic empowerment and financial management aimed at reducing poverty.
